name: starterpack_spa
description: CS52 starterpack for Single Page Apps

scripts.comment: these scripts are what let me type npm run dev or npm run build in terminal. (dev goes to localhost, instead of using a python webserver. Build creates dist folder.)

devDependencies.comment: sass, as installed by npm, is a distribution of dart-sass, which (doesn't run into @import problems). Those were caused by node-sass, a different css preprocessor which is now deprecated.
